digital_asset.title: A Home for your Digital Assets
digital_asset.description: Wallets are used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets like Ethereum and NFTs.

login.title: A New Way to Log In
login.description: Instead of creating new accounts and passwords on every website, just connect your wallet.

what_is_wallet.description: A wallet is used to send, receive, store, and display digital assets. It's also a new way to log in, without needing to create new accounts and passwords on every website.

access.browser: Access your wallet right from your favorite web browser.
access.mobile: Use the mobile wallet to explore the world of Ethereum.

scan.title: Scan with %{name}
scan.mobile: Scan with your phone to download on iOS or Android

helper_text.select_wallet_main_screen: Select a wallet on the main screen to get started with a different wallet provider.

step1.description: Put Argent on your home screen for faster access to your wallet.
step1.title: Open the Argent app

step2.description: Create a wallet and username, or import an existing wallet.
step2.title: Create or Import a Wallet

step3.description: After you scan, a connection prompt will appear for you to connect your wallet.
step3.title: Tap the Scan QR button

step1.description: We recommend putting Bifrost Wallet on your home screen for quicker access.
step1.title: Open the Bifrost Wallet app

step2.description: Create or import a wallet using your recovery phrase.
step2.title: Create or Import a Wallet

step3.description: After you scan, a connection prompt will appear for you to connect your wallet.
step3.title: Tap the scan button

step1.description: We recommend putting BitKeep on your home screen for quicker access.
step1.title: Open the BitKeep app

step2.description: Be sure to back up your wallet using a secure method. Never share your secret phrase with anyone.
step2.title: Create or Import a Wallet

step3.description: After you scan, a connection prompt will appear for you to connect your wallet.
step3.title: Tap the scan button
